enum.name: MAV_CMD
enum.description: Commands to be executed by the MAV. They can be executed on user request, or as part of a mission script.

entry.name: MAV_CMD_BAMBI_START_STOP_MISSION
entry.description: Request to start/stop Bambi mission: it also contain the coordinate of the first mission point
entry.param: Altitude of scanning (in meters, relative to ground)
